attributes.action: Not to have another EU REFERENDUM  just because we democratically voted to leave
attributes.additional_details: There is a petition to have a 2nd referendum because voters who voted to remain a unhappy that they lost, this is ridiculous!
attributes.background: We had a referendum on the EU to leave or remain... The leave campaign won! It is now time to start working together as a country and respect  that we live in a democratic society!
